mapper.select: select o.id,o.serviceId,o.type,s.name,s.parentC,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.userId from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.id = #{orderId} and o.serviceId = s.id

select o.id,o.type,o.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.package_type,o.num,o.delFlag from (select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI, 0 as package_type,0 as num,o.delFlag from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI in(0,2) union select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,oa.package_type,oa.num,o.delFlag from cs_order o,cs_service_api s,cs_order_api oa where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI = 1 and oa.id = o.id) o where 1=1 and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1 order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{id} and o.serviceId = s.id and o.status in (1,2) and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1 order by o.create_date desc

select o.id,o.type,o.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,o.package_type,o.num,o.price,o.orderListId from (select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI, 0 as package_type,0 as num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service s where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI in(0,2) union select o.id,o.type,s.name,o.serviceId,o.begin_date,o.end_date,o.create_date,o.scan_type,o.remarks,o.status,o.websoc,o.payFlag,o.isAPI,oa.package_type,oa.num,o.delFlag,o.price,ifnull(o.orderListId,o.id) as orderListId from cs_order o,cs_service_api s,cs_order_api oa where o.userId = #{userId} and o.serviceId = s.id and isAPI = 1 and oa.id = o.id) o where 1=1
AND o.status in (1,2)
AND o.status in (2,3)
and (o.status in (3,4,5) or (end_date >= now() and o.isAPI = 1))
and o.delFlag != 1 and o.payFlag = 1
group by o.orderListId
order by o.create_date desc
limit #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
